com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.provider

Class WeatherProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.provider.WeatherProviderFactory
  • Deprecated. 
    You shouldn't use this class anymore to instantiate a weather provider from 1.4. Use instead WeatherClient.ClientBuilder

    public class WeatherProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the weather provider class factory. It helps you to create the weather provider providing the configuration parameters
    Author:
    Francesco Azzola
